 2002-21202002-12-10,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
ActCanada Council for the Arts Act
PrecisAppointment of JOHN HOBDAY of Senneville, Quebec, to be Director of the Canada Council for the Arts to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective January 20, 2003.
